doc.after: A phylogenetic tree or evolutionary tree is a branching diagram or tree showing the inferred evolutionary relationships among various biological species or other entities their phylogeny based upon similarities and differences in their physical or genetic characteristics The taxa joined together in the tree are implied to have descended from a common ancestor
